module.name: FreePBX Framework
module.changelog: *12.0.3* Fixes to check online *12.0.2* First Stable Release of 12 *12.0.1rc37* Fix reload issue *12.0.1rc36* Tweaks and fixes to btn tags *12.0.1rc35* Proper reverse depends checking *12.0.1rc34* fun new features *12.0.1rc33* Fix potential i18n issue. *12.0.1rc32* More descriptive errors on amportal. *12.0.1rc31* Hopefully final Signature fixes, also start of new Installer class. *12.0.1rc30* FREEPBX-7743 Call forwarding default feature codes conflict, FREEPBX-7928 Webserver Overrides check if using other webserver than Apache *12.0.1rc29* Increase max execution time in module admin for very slow machines *12.0.1rc28* FREEPBX-8049 add userman setting to amportal *12.0.1rc27* Remove old ARI Settings from installer *12.0.1rc26* FREEPBX-7518, FREEPBX-7999, FREEPBX-8067, *12.0.1rc25* Tweaks and housecleaning *12.0.1rc24* Allow selecting of modules that have security issues *12.0.1rc23* Check for valid language in cookie *12.0.1rc22* Small fix for buffer sizes on gpg checks *12.0.1rc21* Include gpg key locally, fix small rare issue in zap or dahdi barge *12.0.1rc20* UP max exec time in check online, fix FREEPBX-7968 *12.0.1rc19* Change hooks to use variable length parameters *12.0.1rc18* Tweaking some things *12.0.1rc17* Let users know when less cache dirs arent writable *12.0.1rc16* Redo moduleHook to be a persistent static obj *12.0.1rc15* FREEPBX-7880 Add indication when checking online *12.0.1rc14* FREEPBX-7883 Allow old useage of use_warning_banner in BMO *12.0.1rc13* Push languages into hooks as well *12.0.1rc12* Updates to downloader *12.0.1rc11* CLI Install shouldnt just abort *12.0.1rc10* FREEPBX-7903 Attempted fix *12.0.1rc8* And again.. *12.0.1rc7* Check for amportal a different way *12.0.1rc6* Fix amportal updater bit *12.0.1rc5* Revert cli export, yet fix the amportal.conf generator *12.0.1rc4* Final newline issues resolved *12.0.1rc3* Newline after every install command, dont export textarea to cli *12.0.1rc2* Ignore fw_ari on signature check because it doesnt fit into our perfect box *12.0.1rc1* Release Candidate *12.0.1beta35* Added functionality to control ucp functions from amportal *12.0.1beta34* Check for return false and exceptions on module install from BMO *12.0.1beta33* Asterisk 13 support and LESS Fixes *12.0.1beta32* LESS Parser Upgrades *12.0.1beta31* LESS Cleanup *12.0.1beta30* More fixes to Javascript *12.0.1beta29* Fixes to hooks so that they work properly *12.0.1beta28* Fix for overwritten input parameter in BMO::Hooks::processHooks() *12.0.1beta27* Even more javascript validation bugs *12.0.1beta26* Last of the javascript cleanup bugs *12.0.1beta25* Javascript cleanup bugs *12.0.1beta24* Finishing work on BMO Hooks *12.0.1beta23* Tweak, Comment, Label BMO Hooks *12.0.1beta22* Better and more clear error handling *12.0.1beta21* Finishing Touches to PKCS Class *12.0.1beta20* Throw Exception instead of die *12.0.1beta19* Fix GPG permissions *12.0.1beta18* Make sure DSN is a valid string not a random object *12.0.1beta17* Do a FreePBX die if objects are missing so that users can see the error *12.0.1beta16* Revert everything I just did, also add in fixes from Rob *12.0.1beta15* Run GPG checking twice *12.0.1beta14* Run Trust GPG another way *12.0.1beta12* Trust FreePBX at the end of install.php, also tweak GPG permissions *12.0.1beta11* FREEPBX-7538 turn newlines into commas, cache hooks *12.0.1beta10* New Manager Setting of message *12.0.1beta9* Fixes to Module Track Switching *12.0.1beta8* Numerical Representations of dates for security *12.0.1beta7* Dont log landing *12.0.1beta6* FREEPBX-7517 log invalid logins to a security file for parsing *12.0.1beta5* Packaging fixes *12.0.1beta4* Change link on landing page from recordings to UCP *12.0.1beta3* Copy/replace fixes *12.0.1beta2* CLI, If repo doesnt exist check for it online *12.0.1beta1* First Beta Release *12.0.1alpha59* Silence a warning *12.0.1alpha58* Unmet depends are auto downloaded through CLI *12.0.1alpha57* Run trust key inside of install_amp, fix class loader *12.0.1alpha56* GPG Fixes *12.0.1alpha55* Turn on Asterisk Manager on module installs *12.0.1alpha54* Support for Module Namespaces *12.0.1alpha53* Prevent fatal on upgrade if textarea missing *12.0.1alpha52* Added new textarea type and other small fixes *12.0.1alpha51* Fix issue with gpg checks *12.0.1alpha50* FREEPBX-3481 fix login issue when using amportal *12.0.1alpha49* Preping for beta release, final alpha changes *12.0.1alpha48* Changes for Second Database class *12.0.1alpha47* Update jquery to a stable version and update font-awesome *12.0.1alpha46* Hide Framework signatures for now *12.0.1alpha45* Added Support for Module Signature Checking. *12.0.1alpha44* Add support for FreePBX::Modulename(), Return false if we couldnt run install or uninstall, Fixes for manager.conf errors, Use AMPDBHOST, don't hard code localhost. *12.0.1alpha43* Minor AJAX Changes to support non-standard ports. *12.0.1alpha42* FREEPBX-7344 FreePBX generated CSS link for module css files is wrong *12.0.1alpha41* Bring in Less/CSS updates and minor BMO additions. *12.0.1alpha40* Bring in all development work, including css to less work *12.0.1alpha38* Only define DB classes one time *12.0.1alpha37* Update framework DB to have helper functions for functions that mysqli needs *12.0.1alpha36* Revert Use mysqli extension for database access, if available. *12.0.1alpha35* #7141 Use mysqli extension for database access, if available. *12.0.1alpha34* Remove need for jqueryUI buttonset on browsers with CSS3 native support *12.0.1alpha33* Change security shield functionality, add advanced setting to disable nightly update checking *12.0.1alpha32* Add Japanese language support *12.0.1alpha31* FREEPBX-7119 *12.0.1alpha30* #7168 and CSS Updates *12.0.1alpha29* Enable Less Support *12.0.1alpha28* Ensure module hooks aren't duplicated. *12.0.1alpha26* Move BMO Startup to enable proper module integration *12.0.1alpha25* BMO issues with Commercial Modules *12.0.1alpha24* Minor BMO cleanups *12.0.1alpha22* #7123 SECURITY ISSUE introduced in 2.9 *12.0.1alpha18* #6471 Allow better voicemail passwords *12.0.1alpha17* Set CustomPresence on dynamic hints, when available. *12.0.1alpha16* Added help text bubbles to feature code admin re FREEPBX-6903 *12.0.1alpha15* Add remote-unlock feature. This is disabled by default. *12.0.1alpha14* Remove unneeded warning when processing commercial modules. *12.0.1alpha13* Automatically enable repos from module_admin if used with --repo also make standard, standard *12.0.1alpha12* Full fix for module_admin functionality to always attempt to look at master modulexml for list of repos *12.0.1alpha11* BMO didn't know how to preload a module. *12.0.1alpha10* Update to 10, numerous fixes here and there *12.0.1alpha9* And then there was 9, set the Version of FreePBX correctly *12.0.1alpha8* BMO fixes and other things that make this awesome *12.0.1alpha7* Prep for public release 1 *12.0.1alpha6* Update Global SIP Settings Driver Selection *12.0.1alpha5* More Module Admin tweaks and fixes *12.0.1alpha4* Module Admin Javascript bugs fixed *12.0.1alpha3* Module Admin working. Might have some bugs. *12.0.1alpha2* Good start to the first alpha, forgot to package the new javascripts
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
